text: Tekeriš () is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Loznica municipality, in the Mačva District. This village has a Serbian ethnic majority and its population numbers 370 people, according to the 2002 census. ==History== Tekeriš is famous because of the Battle of Cer that occurred here, which was the first allied victory in World War I. ==See also== *List of places in Serbia Category:Populated places in Mačva District Category:Loznica
title: Tekeriš
